APJ000007_Part_A_rubric_category_0.s:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria or to score the response.

To earn this point, responses must demonstrate the following:

  • Identifies at least one digit in downloads

Canonical Solution: 

int onesDigit = downloads % 10;
int remainingDigits = downloads / 10;  
int counter = 0;
 
while (remainingDigits > 0)
{
   int last = remainingDigits % 10;
   remainingDigits = remainingDigits / 10;        
   if (onesDigit == last) 
   {
      counter++;
   }
}   
 
if (counter == 1)
{  
   System.out.println("exactly once");
}
else
{
   System.out.println("not exactly once");
}

BHR000003_rubric_category_0.s:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria or to score the response.

To earn this point, responses must demonstrate the following:

  • Accesses* all necessary elements of grid (in any order, no bounds error)

* An enhanced for loop inherently accesses all elements of an ArrayList

Canonical Solution:

public int countOrderedRows()
{
   int count = 0;
   for (String[] row : grid)
   {
      boolean rowInOrder = true;
      for (int j = 1; j< row.length; j++)
      {
         if (row[j - 1].length() > row[j].length())
         {
            rowInOrder = false;
         }
      }
      if (rowInOrder)
      {
         count++;
      }
   }
   return count;
}

Alternate Canonical:

public int countOrderedRows()
{
   int numRows = 0;
   for (int r = 0; r < grid.length; r++)
   {
      int orderCount = 0;
      for (int c = 0; c < grid[r].length - 1; c++)
      {
         if (grid[r][c].length() <= grid[r][c + 1].length())
         {
            orderCount++;
         }
      }
      if (orderCount == grid[r].length - 1)
      {
         numRows++;
      }
   }
   return numRows;
}

Select a point value to view scoring criteria or to score the response.

To earn this point, responses must demonstrate the following:

  • Accesses all elements of apples

Canonical Solution: 

public int numberOfPies(double poundsPerPie)
{
   double weight = 0;
 
   for (int r = 0; r < apples.length; r++)
   {
      for (int c = 0; c < apples[0].length; c++)
      {
         boolean bad = apples[r][c].isRotten();
 
         if (r > 0 && apples[r - 1][c].isRotten())
         {
            bad = true;
         }
         if (r < apples.length - 1 && 
             apples[r + 1][c].isRotten())
         {
            bad = true;
         }
         if (c > 0 && apples[r][c - 1].isRotten())
         {
            bad = true;
         }
         if (c < apples[0].length - 1 && 
             apples[r][c + 1].isRotten())
         {
            bad = true;
         }
 
         if (!bad)
         {
            weight += apples[r][c].getWeight();
         }
      }
   }
   return (int)(weight / poundsPerPie);
}

public String playerWithClosestScore(int targetScore)
{
   int minDiff = Math.abs(targetScore - 
                          playerList.get(0).getScore());
   String result = playerList.get(0).getID();
    
   for (Player p : playerList)
   {
      int diff = Math.abs(targetScore  p.getScore());
      if (diff < minDiff)
      {
         minDiff = diff;
         result = p.getID();
      }
   }
   return result;
}

Alternate Canonical:

public String playerWithClosestScore(int targetScore)
{
   int minDiff = Math.abs(targetScore - 
                          playerList.get(0).getScore());
   String result = playerList.get(0).getID();
    
   for (int j = 1; j < playerList.size(); j++)
   {
      int diff = Math.abs(targetScore  
                          playerList.get(j).getScore());
      if (diff < minDiff)
      {
         minDiff = diff;
         result = playerList.get(j).getID();
      }
   }
   return result;
}

}

public class TrashCan
{
    private double capacity;
    private double trashAmount;
    
    public TrashCan(double weightCapacity)
    {
      capacity = weightCapacity;
      trashAmount = 0.0;
    }
    
    public double acceptTrash(double dumpWeight)
    {   
      if (trashAmount + dumpWeight >= capacity)
      {
          trashAmount += dumpWeight - capacity;
      } 
      else
      {
          trashAmount += dumpWeight;
      }
      return capacity  trashAmount;              
    }      
}

public double avgTeenAccounts()
{
   int sumAges = 0;
   int countTeens = 0;

   for (GameAccount account : allPlayers)
   {
      int age = account.getAge();
      if (age >= 13 && age <= 19)
      {
         sumAges += age;
         countTeens++;
      }
   }
   return (double) sumAges / countTeens;
}

public class Car 
{
   private double currentFuel;
   private double mpg;
 
   public Car(double c, double m) 
   {
      currentFuel = c;
      mpg = m;
   }
 
   public boolean canMakeTrip(double distance) 
   {
      double fuelRequired = distance / mpg;
      if (fuelRequired <= currentFuel) 
      {
         currentFuel -= fuelRequired;
         return true;
      } 
      else
      {
         return false;
      }
   }
}

Canonical Solution:

public int columnWithFewest(String target)
{
   int minCol = 0;
   int minCount = sched.length;
   for (int col = 0; col < sched[0].length; col++)
   {
      int count = 0;
      for (int row = 0; row < sched.length; row++)
      {
         if (sched[row][col].getStatus().equals(target))
         {
            count++;
         }
      }
      if (count < minCount)
      {
         minCol = col;
         minCount = count;
      }
   }
   return minCol;
}

VHZ000002_rubric_category_0.s:
Select a point value to score the response.

To earn this point, responses must demonstrate the following:

  • Accesses all necessary elements in grid (no bounds errors)

Canonical Solution: 

public int navigate (int startRow, int startCol)
{
   int count = 0;
   int row = startRow;
   int col = startCol;

   while ((row < grid.length) && (col < grid[0].length) 
           && (row >= 0) && (col >= 0))
   {
      count++;
      String dir = grid[row][col];
      if (dir.equals("NE")) 
      {
         row--; 
         col++;
      }
      else if (dir.equals("NW"))
      {
         row--;
         col--;
      }
      else if (dir.equals("SE"))
      {
         row++;
         col++;
      }
      else if (dir.equals("SW"))
      {
         row++;
         col--;
      }
   }
   return count;
}

Canonical Solution: 

public RobotMover(int numMoves)
{
   moveSequence = "";
   for (int j = 1; j <= numMoves; j++)
   {
      double prob = Math.random();   

      if (prob < 0.25)
      {
         moveSequence += "up_";
      }
      else if (prob < 0.5)
      {
         moveSequence += "down_";
      }
      else if (prob < 0.75)
      {
         moveSequence += "left_";
      }
      else
      {
         moveSequence += "right_";
      }
   }
}

public int countOccurrences(String str)
{
   int count = 0;
   String temp = moveSequence;

   while(temp.indexOf(str) >= 0)
   {
      int loc = temp.indexOf(str);
      temp = temp.substring(loc + 1);
      count++;
   }    
   return count;
}

Alternate Canonical:

public int countOccurrences(String str)
{
   int occ = 0;
   for (int start = 0; start < moveSequence.length(); 
        start++)
   {
      if (moveSequence.substring(start).indexOf(str) == 0)
      {
         occ++;
      }
   }
   return occ;
}

public void upgrade(int upgradeRow, int upgradeCol)
{
   int maxRating = 0;
   int swapRow = -1;
   int swapCol = -1;
   for (int r = upgradeRow + 1; r < chart.length; r++)
   {
      for (int c = 0; c < chart[0].length; c++)
      {
         if (chart[r][c] != null)
         {
            int curRating = chart[r][c].getRating();
            if (curRating > maxRating)
            {
               maxRating = curRating;
               swapRow = r;
               swapCol = c;
            }
         }
      }
   }
   chart[upgradeRow][upgradeCol] = chart[swapRow][swapCol];
   chart[swapRow][swapCol] = null;
}

To earn this point, responses must demonstrate the following:

  • Declares class header: class CupcakeMachine

Canonical Solution: 

public class CupcakeMachine
{
   private int availCupcakes;
   private double cupcakeCost;
   private int orderNum;
 
   public CupcakeMachine(int num, double cost)
   {
      availCupcakes = num;
      cupcakeCost = cost;
      orderNum = 1;
   }
 
   public String takeOrder(int quantity)
   {
      String message = "Order cannot be filled";
 
      if (quantity <= availCupcakes)
      {
         availCupcakes -= quantity;
         double cost = quantity * cupcakeCost;
         message = "Order number " + orderNum 
                   + ", cost $" + cost;
         orderNum++;
      }
           
      return message;
   }
}

Canonical Solution: 

public class LapTracker
{
   private int numLaps;
   private int numCalls;
   private int resetFrequency;

   public LapTracker(int resetFreq)
   {
      numLaps = 0;
      numCalls = 0;
      resetFrequency = resetFreq;
   }

   public int addLaps(int additionalLaps)
   {
      if (numCalls == resetFrequency)
      {
         numCalls = 0;
         numLaps = 0;
      }
      numCalls++;
      numLaps += additionalLaps;
      return numLaps;
   }
}

Canonical Solution:

public double averageWithinRange(double lower, double upper) 
{
   double sum = 0.0;
   int count = 0;
 
   for (ItemInfo it : inventory) 
   {     
      if (it.isAvailable() && it.getCost() >= lower 
          && it.getCost() <= upper)
      {
         sum += it.getCost(); 
         count++;
      }
   }
   return sum / count; 
}

Canonical Solution: 

public double averageWithinRange(double lower, double upper) 
{
   double sum = 0.0;
   int count = 0;
 
   for (ItemInfo it : inventory) 
   {     
      if (it.isAvailable() && it.getCost() >= lower 
          && it.getCost() <= upper)
      {
         sum += it.getCost(); 
         count++;
      }
   }
   return sum / count; 
}
